title: BRIEF-Helen of Troy Q4 Adjusted Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.69 From Cont Ops
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - Helen of Troy Ltd:
* HELEN OF TROY LIMITED REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER FISCAL 2018 RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.69 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.31 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q4 REVENUE $390.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $351.4 MILLION
* SEES FY 2019 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $7.30 TO $7.55 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* SEES FY 2019 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $6.30 TO $6.50 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* SEES FY 2019 SALES $1.485 BILLION TO $1.51 BILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.41 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $7.18, REVENUE VIEW $1.48 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* COMPANY EXPECTS CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN RANGE OF $30.0 MILLION TO $35.0 MILLION FOR FISCAL 2019 Source text for Eikon:
